New ads, check them out!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2006 Topics (Year of the Mercury Drop): New ads, check them out!
By Lisa Shock on Sunday, December 3, 2006 - 11:09 am:

It's that time of the year again, Delphi wants the $35 for chat and some other expenses are coming due.

I have added a Paypal link, the "Make a Donation" button, you do NOT need a Paypal account to use it, just a bank account OR credit/debit card.

In other news, Gamestop changed providers for its affiliate program, and they (plus EB) rejected us for participation in the new program. (we weren't doing that well with them anyway, I got a $20 check a couple of years ago...) So, I have looked into other merchants that will allow us in, and chose a few that I thought people here might like to know about.

As always, I get about %5 of any purchases people make through the links. The site costs me about a thousand dollars a year to run, so, any help is appreciated.

I will point out that aLibris is my favorite used book seller online, I have been a customer since they started about a decade ago. They have rarities that other sites don't, and a great system for detailing book condition.

X-tremegeek.com has some fun, inexpensive, tech related items that look like they'd be cool to own or give.

Anyway, thanks everyone, I am trying to keep ad presence small and unobtrusive. As always, you will never see a popup/popunder ad on this site.

By MR. Champion on Saturday, December 9, 2006 - 01:14 pm:

I went to the donation page. A tad confused tho. Billing information?

Just fill out the whole thing or? (donation by debit btw)

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, December 9, 2006 - 04:41 pm:

The billing info is for you to type in the address info that's on your bank account. This makes it harder for someone who stole a credit card to use it. All of the data they ask for is from you, and it needs to match the statements your bank sends you.
